title: America's Greatest Mind Reader - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/11/21
itunes:title: America's Greatest Mind Reader - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/11/21
description:
George Noory and psychic Joe Diamond discuss his career as a mentalist and a magician, how he navigated the world's largest maze blindfolded in record time, and how he was able to hack the Pentagon without using a computer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
